article_title: The Most Insidious Line In The State Of The Union Address?

article_metadata.author: George Leef

og.description: Progressives want subservient people who look upward to government, beseeching the rulers for sustenance and favors. Minimum wage laws help engender that mindset.
og.title: The Most Insidious Line In The State Of The Union Address?
